attributes.documentation:
he DRCT_Token is an ERC20 compliant token representing the payout of the swap contract
pecified in the Factory contract.
ach Factory contract is specified one DRCT Token and the token address can contain many
ifferent swap contracts that are standardized at the Factory level.
